pages.text: $(li)Bee Nest are naturally generated blocks where Bees live.$(br)$(li)To harvest Honey, you have to right click on the Bee Nest while you are holding a Glass Bottle in your hand.

$(li)To harvest Honeycomb, you have to right click on the Bee Nest while you are holding Shears in your hand.$(br)$(li)After harvesting, you will have to wait until obtain more Honey again.$(br)$(li)Harvesting from a Bee Nest causes any bees inside it becomes aggressive to you, unless there is a fire directly beneath it or a lit Campfire within five blocks below, and the smoke is not obstructed.
